data.actual_result: Browser keeps reporting that recording input is being used
data.expected_result: Page should update and stop using recording input (and make browser recognise)
data.short_description: Access to mic persists after logging out on browser
data.steps_to_repro: - Open browser (works both Chrome and Firefox) - Navigate to  - Log in - Make sure microphone is enabled (and it's allowed in the browser) - Log out of Discord, getting redirected to /login page - Tab still reports that recording is in use
